page.title: 01FISH MARKET by Steven Pickin
page.content: Fish Market by Steven Pickin In the morning the trawlers come around the stone built breakwater, the sea gulls argue over everything. Once in the market the fish are weighed and packed ready for sale. The price differs according to the kind of fish.The trawlers come in at any time at all during the day. My uncle owns two trawlers and one crabber. I have been out on the crabber twice, it is "ace"!One of the crab pots had six crabs in it , two spider crabs and four edible ones.In Britain the edible crabs are the most popular , but in France it is the spider crabs that they like to eat best.
